actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs with amendment, S. Rept. 93-684.

actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Reported to House from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs, H. Rept. 93-1520.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to convey, by quitclaim deed, all right, title, and interest of the United States in and to certain lands in Coueur d'Alene, Idaho, in order to eliminate a cloud on the title to such lands.

summary.text: (LATEST SUMMARY) Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to convey, by quit-claim deed, all right, title, and interest of the United States in and to specified lands in Coeur d'Alene, Idaho, in order to eliminate a cloud on the title to such lands.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to convey, by quitclaim deed, all right, title, and interest of the United States in and to certain lands in Coueur d'Alene, Idaho, in order to eliminate a cloud on the title to such lands.
